attributes.action: Prioritise Climate Change and Emissions Policies as a matter of urgency
attributes.background: As the country suffers a heatwave that sees the hottest days on record our government remains silent. We believe that there is no longer time to deny and deflect and we demand the not only the prioritisation of climate and emissions actions, but also transparency of the above to the British people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/260047 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257208
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245708
